    • Method Detail

      • processParagraph

        public int processParagraph(int paragraphNum)
        Convert a paragraph to a requirement
        Parameters:
        paragraphNum - the 0-based running number of the paragraph to read in the entire document
        Returns:
        the paragraph number of the next paragraph to read -1

      • getCurrentRequirement

        public RequirementOrdinary getCurrentRequirement()
        Get the requirement from the last run of processParagraph(int)
        Returns:
        the last requirement, or null if there was no requirement at the given offset

      • getRootRequirement

        public RequirementRoot getRootRequirement()
        Returns:
        a handle to the root of the resulting requirement tree

        Parameters:
        lastRequirement - the last processed requirement to inject
